doc:
Howard Hesseman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Howard_Hesseman 0 Howard Hesseman (born February 27, 1940) is an American actor best known for playing DJ Dr. Johnny Fever on WKRP in Cincinnati, Captain Pete Lassard in Police Academy 2: Their First Assignment, Sam Royer on One Day at a Time and schoolteacher Charlie Moore on Head of the Class. Howard_Hesseman ( born February_27_,_1940 ) is an_American_actor best_known for playing DJ_Dr._Johnny_Fever on WKRP in Cincinnati , Captain_Pete_Lassard in Police_Academy_2 : Their_First_Assignment , Sam_Royer on One_Day at a_Time_and_schoolteacher_Charlie_Moore on Head of the_Class .
